bike.description: S-Works SL4 FACT 11r, FACT IS construction, compact race design, 1-3/8" lower bearing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ 8mm carbon cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
New S-Works ProSet Stem, 7050 3D forged with carbon-clip front cap/cone, 4-degree shim, CNC head bolts
Shimano Dura-Ace STI, Flight Deck compatible
Shimano Dura-Ace STI, Flight Deck compatible, 10-speed
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
S-Works Turbo w/ BlackBelt protection, 220 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
S-Works Turbo w/ BlackBelt protection, 220 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Pro, carbon rails
